Variables.Usage: Building size based on lot area percentage

Conditions.Mandatory: Building size is based on a percentage of the lot area
New lot must meet width, depth, and area requirements

Explicit deviations: Underlying lot lines removal with no net loss of housing
Combining substandard lot with another lot with no net loss of housing
Resultant number of lots increases or stays the same with no net loss of housing

Qualifiers.Scope: Substandard lot sizes in R-1 zones
Qualifiers.Applicability: Variety of lot sizes within each R-1 zone

Conditions.Mandatory: Lot must meet width, depth, and area criteria to be considered substandard
Building height, street-side yard, and garage location requirements
